title: Camera grip in League of Legends
body: Hey, kinda a new player here but wanted to know if there is camera grip in League of Legends and if there is, is there anyway I can use the camera grip function like in Dota 2? I bind my camera grip key to 'T' on Dota so how it works is is press T then left click to move the camera, is there anyway i can do that in league?

replies.body: If you're looking for a way to move the camera with an easy mouse click, you can left click on the minimap itself and drag the camera around that way.
